item.title: Raichur villagers allege industries polluting Krishna river; Upa Lokayukta flags illegal mining, RIMS lapses
item.description:
<![CDATA[BENGALURU: Several industries in Raichur district are allegedly discharging untreated chemical effluents into the Krishna river, causing widespread skin ailments among villagers and farmers, besides killing fish and harming livestock and pets. These were among the grave complaints presented to Deputy Lokayukta (Upa Lokayukta) Justice B Veerappa during his recent visit to the district.
